comments.list_all: SELECT * FROM hull_blog_comments ORDER BY approved ASC, commentid ASC OFFSET {{offset}} LIMIT {{limit}}

posts.list_all: SELECT * FROM view_hull_blog_list ORDER BY postid DESC OFFSET {{offset}} LIMIT {{limit}}
posts.list_mine: SELECT * FROM view_hull_blog_list l LEFT JOIN hull_blog_author_owners a ON l.author = a.authorid WHERE l.status OR a.userid = ? ORDER BY postid DESC OFFSET {{offset}} LIMIT {{limit}}
posts.list_versions: SELECT * FROM hull_blog_post_versions WHERE post = ? ORDER BY versionid DESC
posts.latest_version: SELECT * FROM hull_blog_post_versions WHERE post = ? ORDER BY versionid DESC OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1

series.list_all: SELECT * FROM hull_blog_series ORDER BY name ASC OFFSET {{offset}} LIMIT {{limit}}
series.list_for_author: SELECT * FROM hull_blog_series WHERE author IN {{authorids}} ORDER BY name ASC OFFSET {{offset}} LIMIT {{limit}}
series.tree: SELECT s.* FROM hull_blog_series_items i LEFT JOIN hull_blog_series s ON i.parent = s.seriesid WHERE i.series = ? AND i.parent NOT IN {{valueset}}
